formElement.label: View:
formElement.documentation: The name of a ClearCase dynamic view, used to query and label elements within a ClearCase VOB.

formElement.label: Path:
formElement.documentation: The name of a path within the specified ClearCase view, used to access and label elements within a ClearCase VOB.

formElement.label: Branch:
formElement.documentation: The name of a branch within the specified ClearCase path.
